metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6071 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
nuSOAP before 0.7.3-5 does not properly check the hostname of a cert.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6071` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnusoap-php - 0.7.3-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nusoap package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.7.3-5').
